definition: Huangshi prefecture-level city in Hubei
surname Huang or Hwang
yellow/pornographic/to fall through
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
surname Shi
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
market/city/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The development of Huangshi textile clothing industry has its inherent inferior position.
sentences.chinese: 黄石市纺织服装业的发展有先天不足之劣势。

sentences.english: Huangshi clothing industry has made brilliant achievements while nowadays is on the decline.
sentences.chinese: 黄石市的服装业曾经有过辉煌，但如今却在走下坡路。

sentences.english: Huangshi textile clothing industry has some foundation.
sentences.chinese: 黄石市纺织服装业有一定的基础条件。

sentences.english: Combined with the practical conditions of Huangshi city, the driving forces caused the change were analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 并结合黄石市实际情况，分析引起这种变化的驱动力。

sentences.english: The textile clothing industry is a traditional industry in Huangshi City.
sentences.chinese: 纺织服装业是黄石市的一个传统产业。

sentences.english: That I would be dismissed by the Huangshi Municipal Public Security Bureau is a conclusion I've anticipated for some time.
sentences.chinese: 我被黄石市公安局辞退，这是我早已预料到的结局。
